other_tests.findings: Produced considerable improvement, but after treatments were stopped, she rapidly returned to her prior condition.
No significant change occurred during an entire year of lithium treatment.
other_tests.changes_over_time: After the addition of acetophenazine, there was a gradual attenuation of the activity cycle over the following 6 months.

other_tests.findings: Coded lithium was given in dosages adjusted to maintain serum levels between 0.8 and 1.2 mEq/liter.
other_tests.changes_over_time: By day 600, both nursing staff and her psychiatrist considered her essentially free of her previous illness.

other_tests.findings: A typical activation phase recurred in a matter of weeks after substitution.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Lithium was then reinstituted, and as of September 1980, there had been no further recurrences.

other_tests.findings: Patient was fully oriented to time and place, with a somewhat spotty memory of the past 42 years.
